MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. it is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm due to third party damaged on our underground cable network, and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 4:40pm on Friday 2nd April.
